text: What you are about to witness is a reenactment of some of the stupidest exercises you see, sadly, every time you work out in the gym. Remember: do NOT try these yourself. I am a professional with extensive experience and a Teflon spine. In fact, never try these. Like, NEVER. Or risk showing up in someone else's gym fail videos. Now, onto the exercises. The greatest exercise and workout fails ever!
title: 23 Greatest Exercise Fails (HORRIBLE!)
